title: Nepal Joins China's Belt And Road Initiative, Raises Concerns For New Delhi

title: 108 Metre "Chunri" Offered To Temple As Nepal City Celebrates Ram-Sita Wedding
content: A Chunri measuring 108 meters has been offered to the Janaki Temple of Nepal by a trust from Surat (Gujarat, India) on the occasion of 'Bibah Panchami', marking the wedding of Lord Ram with Goddess Sita.
summary: A Chunri measuring 108 meters has been offered to the Janaki Temple of Nepal by a trust from Surat (Gujarat, India) on the occasion of 'Bibah Panchami', marking the wedding of Lord Ram with Goddess Sita.

title: UP Man Given Death Penalty In Saudi On Drug Charges, Family Pleads For Mercy
content: A court in Saudi Arabia has sentenced a man from Meerut in Uttar Pradesh to death on charges of drug trafficking, triggering panic and despair among his family members who have pleaded for clemency.
summary: A court in Saudi Arabia has sentenced a man from Meerut in Uttar Pradesh to death on charges of drug trafficking, triggering panic and despair among his family members who have pleaded for clemency.

title: United Healthcare CEO Brian Thompson Shot Dead In New York, Gunman At Large

title: "Muhammad Yunus Involved In Genocide": Sheikh Hasina In 1st Public Address

title: French PM Michel Barnier Faces No Confidence Vote. All You Need To Know
content: France is facing a critical moment as lawmakers vote on a no-confidence motion against Prime Minister Michel Barnier's government. This vote is likely to have significant implications for the country's political and economic stability.

title: UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson Shot Dead In Manhattan: Report
content: Brian Thompson, the CEO of UnitedHealth's insurance unit, was fatally shot in the chest on Wednesday morning outside the Hilton hotel in midtown Manhattan, the NY Post and Bloomberg reported, citing police sources.
summary: Brian Thompson, the CEO of UnitedHealth's insurance unit, was fatally shot in the chest on Wednesday morning outside the Hilton hotel in midtown Manhattan, the NY Post and Bloomberg reported, citing police sources.

title: Trump Eyes Ron DeSantis For Pentagon Amid Reports Of Misconduct By Hegseth

title: Russia Advances In East Ukraine, Zelensky Calls For Urgent Reinforcements
content: President Volodymyr Zelensky called on Tuesday for major reinforcement of sectors in eastern Ukraine of the 1,000-km (600-mile) front line, where Russian forces have made consistent gains in recent months.

title: Spanish Babies Develop 'Werewolf Syndrome' After Parents Use Hair-Loss Drug

title: South Korean Opposition Submits Motion To Impeach President Yoon: 10 Facts

title: Daily Life In Seoul Ticks On, But In Shock, After 6-Hour Martial Law Drama
content: South Koreans went to offices, businesses and schools as usual on Wednesday with scarcely any visible signs in the capital Seoul that six hours of surprise martial law and high political drama overnight had spilled into everyday life.

title: How Vietnamese Business Tycoon Masterminded World's Biggest Bank Fraud
content: Truong My Lan, a 68-year-old real estate tycoon, was convicted in April 2024 for using hundreds of ghost companies to control Saigon Commercial Bank and embezzle billions.
summary: Truong My Lan, a 68-year-old real estate tycoon, was convicted in April 2024 for using hundreds of ghost companies to control Saigon Commercial Bank and embezzle billions.
